column5: Drove by it on the 403. Looks interesting. Anyone have any info on this lake? Are there fish? Can it be fished?

never heard anything about anyone fishing it. access would be a problem. off of dunmark rd is heron point golf club, and all private properties off of jerseyvile rd/sunnyridge rd.  it is almost as big as the local conservation area lakes and i would only assume the fishing to be similar. its muddy complexion suggests it may be shallow.
Unless the website of hookandbullet.com hasn't updated their info in years, http://www.hookandbullet.com/fishing-dunmark-lake-aylmer-on/ Says there's Bass and Pike. Please follow up. Thanks.
there are those species.  we used to fish it at night as kids....  no public access.

Just a heads up....hook and bullet is completely useless for species lists.  Go back and look up the same lake a few different times.  You'll get different species.  When you see sturgeon and salmon in small landlocked lakes, you get the idea.
